dc_title_s: Bridgeport and adjoining neighborhoods /prepared by Department of Sociology, University of Chicago, 1923.
dc_description_s: Blue line print. Shows vacant areas, residential areas, commercial frontage, industrial areas, railroad property, surface lines, private schools, warehouse property, and churches.; Scale [ca. 1:8,000]; photocopy; Master and use copy. Digital master created according to Benchmark for Faithful Reproductions of Monographs and Serials, Version 1. Digital Library Federation, December 2002.
dc_creator_sm: University of Chicago Department of Sociology
